short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: add to tinypin context menu plugin

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
add to tinypin context menu plugin.

This extension adds a context-menu option to images to allow you to quickly add images to a self-hosted tinypin instance.

tinypin > https://github.com/slynn1324/tinypin
